entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GenAPI produces invalid output for System.Drawing.Common/8.0.0 #38375
  • [ dotnet-8.0.200-rtm.24069.25] dotnet tool install command doesn't show install successful message #38355
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.200] dotnet tool install command get access deny message #38354

Closed

  • [Questions] How to know the latest installed dotnet sdk version on a non sdk style project file like .vcxproj #30289
  • dotnet tool install hangs, then fails #30248
  • dotnet cli does not handle arguments with quotes from PowerShell correctly #29770
  • Issue occurred when running dotnet clean command on console #29641
  • Props file adding implicit usings matching using EndsWith on ProjectName doesn't work when xaml files are added #29307
  • Net 7 -c# 11 Interpolated Strings Object reference not set exception #29373
  • dotnet publish with --no-build broken after dotnet 7 SDK upgrade #29296
  • CLI parsing error in .net 7 handling #29295
  • Commands like `dotnet nuget push --help` do not give help, but forcing an error does #29048
  • Mac OS .NET Incompatible Architecture Need ARM4e #28792
  • (7.0 rc2) dotnet build suddenly stopped working #28777
  • Make classes sealed by default #28610
  • Invalid and unknown locale warnings for package assets should be gated on TFM #28058
  • SSR with .net6 and angular template #27839
  • cli: dotnet --latest #27801
  • Net 7 sdk build freezes computer #27697
  • Passing properties with multiple values stops woring with net7 RC1 - 7.0.100-rc.1.22431.12 #28131
  • dotnet pack No Longer Correctly Parses Semicolon-Delimited Build Properties Starting in 6.0.301 #27319
  • Prefer to use project templates created in previous .NET versions #27065
  • .net6 Ambiguous reference in rider, but build success. #26522
  • dotnet [packagename] not working #26490
  • Enable FDD + (implicit) RID-specific apps with `RuntimeSpecific` #26031
  • The dotnet publish command using dll timestamp instead of specified version when coping #25776
  • visualstudio code support for Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.Sdk #38377
  • mac arm64 vscode unable to find path. Unable to locate the .NET SDK. Check that it is installed and that the version specified in global.json #24753
  • Linux and Mac OSX terminal input is not rendered after `Ctrl+C` is used to terminate `dotnet run` whilst calling `Console.ReadLine` or `Console.ReadKey` or `Console.Read` #24740
  • macOS arm64 vs. x64: improve PEBKAC handling #24737
  • Net472 projects referencing netstandard via a netstandard library not recognized as NETStandard dependent #24559
  • .NET SDK 3.1 replaced the nampespace name with '_" where if ";" used #23916
  • [NETSDKE2E]Publishing blazorwasm project failed with AOT compilation = true with .net9 SDK #37524
  • 'dotnet workload list' CLI command should not download and install workloads without a user permission #38026

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38382
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Add 8.0.2xx and 8.0.3xx changelog files for containers tooling #38380
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove unused StringWriter from GenerateToolSettingsFile Task #38378
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Support glob patterns when ignoring baseline TFMs #38374
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • Cleanup _DotNetPublishToBlobFeed variable in .vsts-ci.yml #38320
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add 8.0.2xx and 8.0.3xx changelog files for containers tooling #38336
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview1] Fix VSTest MSBuild and Terminal Logger integration #38371
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged

Updated

  • Update to the Jan 8.0.1 released version of the runtime #38344
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IP: .NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Include version in deps.json #38087
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Install Records for VS Managed Workloads During 'Update' #38346
    Area-Workloads
  • [Issue #37501] Verbosity Options default to `minimal` from `quiet` #38277
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update for loc #37985
    localization, Area-Infrastructure, DO NOT MERGE
